headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BURTEN, KATHARINE, M.D.

snippet: BURTEN--Katharine, M.D.,a retired psychiatrist, passed away peacefully at her home in Larchmont, New York on June 16, 2016, at the age of 68. Dr. Burten grew up in the San Francisco Bay Area and was then a resident of New York for most of her adult life. She graduated from Redwood High School, Larkspur, California in 1965, received a Bachelor of Arts degree from Hunter College, New York in 1973, and went on to receive her Doctor of Medicine Degree from University of Miami in 1976. She will be greatly missed for her kindness, loving nature, wisdom and compassion. She was a loving and devoted wife to William Burten, M.D. (pre-deceased) for 30 years. She is survived by her loving family including son Michael Burten of Larchmont, New York; daughter Anne Burten of Ellensburg, Washington; sister Elizabeth Higgins of Sunnyvale, California and brother Mark Hammock of Petaluma, California. Donations to the Larchmont Library or the Audubon Society. 1/3
